name: Low Gravity Gems!
description:
Save the world - Collect all gems!

The game can be downloaded on several platforms or played online.

Powered by Luca Galliani (Tarrasqu3)

The 4 modifications are:

1. Game play modification: You can move the astronaut using also the arrows on the keyboard, not only the buttons WASD.

2.  Created obstacles and challenges: Several platforms have different velocities and directions, in order to create difficult coordination in the game.

3. In-Game GUI: Traps!: Some platforms are apparently sure, and some platforms are apparently solid.

4. Enemie flight invincible for the jump: Use the flight enemy to jump on the next platform
